## Player.isMuted() method

Indicates muted state of the video.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isMuted(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

## Remarks

Note that muted state is independent from the volume level. See [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLMediaElement/muted](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLMediaElement/muted)
